account.title: Personal Account
account.instructionsText: After clicking the 'Generate' button, you will receive: a QR code to connect with Google Authenticator, and a secret key (in case you need to enter it manually). Use either of these to link your account with Google Authenticator. On your next login, you will need to enter the code from the app to verify your identity.
account.instructionsText2: After clicking the 'Enable' button, you will receive: a QR code to connect with Google Authenticator, and a secret key (in case you need to enter it manually). Use either of these to link your account with Google Authenticator. On your next login, you will need to enter the code from the app to verify your identity.
account.logoutText: Are you sure you want to log out?
account.name: Name
account.FA1title: Download Google Authenticator for Android / iOS
account.FA1sub: A large catalog of private cheats directly from developers.Play with full immersion in the dynamics!
account.FA2title: Add the secret phrase to Google Authenticator.You must save it!
account.FA2sub: Open Google Authenticator and scan the QR code below,or enter the secret phrase to activate the confirmation token.
account.FA3title: Use the generated code to sign in
account.FA3sub: After adding the token to Google Authenticator, a one-time code will become available. Enter this code during login — it is your key to secure access to the system.

guarant.guaranteText: Don't risk your money and time — choose our software, and our guarantees will ensure your success! But don't forget, using cheats is always at your own risk. Even cheats with a long undetect status may eventually be detected.
guarant.tech2: We provide FREE technical support to our clients and can set up the program ourselves, without your involvement, if it's more convenient. Support is available via Discord or Telegram. Please contact support only through the contact details provided on the website.
guarant.reputS: We value our reputation and our clients. Please remember to leave honest reviews of the cheats only after thoroughly testing their functionality. Don't make hasty conclusions if something doesn't work right away. We sell only quality products.
guarant.returnS: We offer a money-back guarantee if the product purchased on our site doesn't run or work properly. But keep in mind, your Windows system must meet the recommended requirements of the private cheat.

contacts.contactsS: For cooperation inquiries or any other information,you can contact us through the following channels:
